net.openhft.chronicle.core.onoes

Interface ExceptionHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GoogleExceptionHandler, NullExceptionHandler, PrintExceptionHandler, RecordingExceptionHandler, Slf4jExceptionHandler, StackoverflowExceptionHandler, WebExceptionHandler
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface ExceptionHandler
    Created by Peter on 13/06/2016.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean isEnabled(Class aClass) 
      default void on(Class clazz, String message) 
      void on(Class clazz, String message, Throwable thrown)
      A method to call when an exception occurs.
      default void on(Class clazz, Throwable thrown) 

    • Method Detail

      • on

        default void on(Class clazz,
                Throwable thrown)

      • on

        default void on(Class clazz,
                String message)

      • on

        void on(Class clazz,
        String message,
        Throwable thrown)
        A method to call when an exception occurs. It assumes there is a different handler for different levels.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the error is associated with, e.g. the one in which it was caught
        message - any message associated with the error, or empty String.
        thrown - any Thorwable caught, or null if there was no exception.

      • isEnabled

        default boolean isEnabled(Class aClass)
